concept.title: What's new
concept.shortdesc: This topic lists the dates and nature of updates to the published information of the ODF FlashSystem driver.

row.entry: Nature of updates to the published information

entry.p: The version information was added in IBM Documentation as part of the initial ODF FlashSystem driver 1.3.0 release.

ODF FlashSystem driver adds new support for the following:
Multiple FlashSystem storage systems, including health, capacity, and performance information.
Storage calculations for FlashSystem child pools.
External storage system calculations.
